settings.custom_liquid:
Clinically proven Acne & Rosacea Treatment Recovery & Repair Gel

(Based on 102 reviews)

The exclusive combination of our bio-marine red algae and the most efficient form of oralphytoceramides on the market, has resulted in a super-charged collagen drink. Filled with powerful antioxidants and unique clinically tested marine collagen, your daily Glow Shot will fight ageing, improve skin structure and hydration as well as boosting your immune system and gut health. Collagen alone cannot build-up the essential proteins your skin needs. It requires Astaxanthin. Glow Shot is the first daily collagen shot to combine clinically tested collagen and Astaxanthin. It's 98% natural and 100% effective. Glow Shot provides a triple daily hydration boost. Across clinical studies, skin’s hydration and moisture levels increased by at least 50% over a three-month period.
Flavor

settings.heading: Main Ingredients
settings.content: Peptan® Hydrolysed Collagen (Fish),Ceramosides™ Wheat (Triticum aestivum) seed oil,Kousou Ekiso Extract (Red Algae).

settings.heading: List of Ingredients
settings.content: Water, Peptan® Hydrolysed Collagen (Fish), Kousou Ekiso Extract, natural flavouring, Preservative (potassium sorbate), Acidity Regulator (Citric Acid), Vitamin C(Ascorbic Acid), Ceramosides™ Wheat (Triticum aestivum) seed oil, Borage Seed Oil (Borago officinalis L.), Stabilizer (Xanthan gum), Curcuma Longa Extract,Sodium Hyaluronate, Sweetener (Sucralose), Vitamin E (d-Alpha Tocopherol), Zinc gluconate, N-Acetyl Glucosamine, Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Black Pepper Extract (Piper nigrum L.), Copper gluconate, D-Bioti

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content: Simply unscrew the cap, drink and enjoy. Within 28 days, you’ve helped to regain the collagen protein in your skin structure and nourished it with nutrients. By 56 days you may see visible skin improvements such as better elasticity and moisture retention. At 84 Days, you’ve supplemented your skin with awhopping 420g of collagen and 42g of our exclusive red algae extract, which has shown better elasticity, anti-ageing benefits, and in some people mayboost muscle mass.

settings.heading: How to use
settings.content:
For the face: Gently massage a small amount of the gel to cleansed skin, until fully absorbed. Use as part of your daily skin care routine. For best results, use twice daily.

For the body: Gently massage a small amount of the gel to the area of concern, until fully absorbed. For best results, use twice daily.

Recommendations: For dry, irritated red skin, use the gel between 1 to 3 times a day. For sensitivity to sunlight, please apply sun protection or any other topical cream prior to application of the gel (Dermatological recommendation)

We recommend to trial the gel on a small area of skin at least 24 hours prior to initial use.

Cautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If this should occur, rinse thoroughly with clean water. Keep out of reach of children.

*Suitable for any skin type and safe for pregnant women

How Glow Shot Works

The exclusive combination of our own bio-marine red algae and the most efficient form of phytoceramides on the market, has resulted in a super-charged collagen drink. Filled with powerful antioxidants and clinically tested marine collagen, your daily Glow Shot will fight ageing, improve skin structure and hydration as well as boosting your immune system and gut health.

GLOW SHOT Daily Collagen Benefits

We don’t want anyone to lose their glow. Collagen makes up over 70% of our skin which keeps our complexions plump, fresh and hydrated. But as we age, our natural collagen depletes. Formulated with peptan, ceramosidesand Seacrared algae, Glow Shot, is your ultimate daily collagen dose. Oh, and did we mention it also comes in three tantalising flavours?

settings.heading: 28 Days
settings.description: You’ve now supplemented your body with 140g of collagen and 14g of our innovative red algae extract –which is helping you regain collagen protein in the skin structure and nourishing it with nutrients.

settings.heading: 56 Days
settings.description: With 280 grams of collagen and 28 grams of Seacrared algae extract in your daily regimen, you can see visible skin improvements such as better elasticity and moisture retention.

settings.heading: 84 Days
settings.description: It’s not even been three full months and you’ve supplemented your skin with a whopping 420g of collagen and 42g of red algae extract, which is leading to betterelasticity, anti-ageing benefits, and may boost muscle mass: Research shows that collagen supplements may help prevent the loss of muscle mass known as Sarcopenia, which can occur with aging.In a 12-week study, 27 men with this condition took 15 grams of collagen while participating in a daily exercise program. The result was significant gains in muscle mass and strength compared to men who only exercised but didn’t take the supplement.
